title: margaret dunlop
subtitle:
Even a toddler wants to read this book to find out how a boy refugee from Hitler became a successful scientist, met Dolly the cloned sheep, worked for the United Nations in exotic countries and in China with the yak.

An inspiring #biography

subtitle:
